welcome_text:
Welcome to PARTY
your partner app for fun time
name: Name
password_less6: Your password must be longer than 6 characters
email_in_use: This email is already being used.
user_not_found: We couldn't find any users with that email.
too_many_request: Too many requests to log into this account.
operation_not_allowed: Error not server, try again later.
login_error: Fazer login failed, please try again.
envied_to_home: Upon logging out you will be taken to the home screen.
error_save_data: We had a problem saving your data, please ask for help.
select_image: It is necessary to select an image!
type_description: Tell us more about your establishment
empty_parties1: In this section you will find suggestions for sponsored places in your area.
empty_parties2: Oops! there seems to be not enough locations, click here to see all available locations!
empty_events1: In this section you will find suggestions for sponsored events in your area.
empty_events2: Oops! it seems there aren't enough events, click here to see all available venues!
enter_the_address: Enter the address of the establishment
empty_images: The property does not have photos.
address_error: We couldn't find this address, please give us more details.
maps_info: We rely on the help of Google Maps to locate you, if your establishment is already registered on the platform, just write its name and we will try to locate it.
empty_parties3: Oops! We couldn't find any locations for this track near you.
local_permission: Oops! it looks like you have not authorized access to your location.
local_permission1: Our application relies on this feature so that we can provide you with data. Please allow Party access to your device location.
local_permission2: If you previously declined, you need to authorize manually in settings.
